title: Refraction - water to unknown medium - 50 deg aoi

content.question: A beam of light in water (index of refraction <math alttext="n equals 1.33" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.33</mn></math>) strikes a boundary with an unknown medium at an angle of incidence of <math alttext="50 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mn>50</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup></math>, as shown in the figure. The beam refracts into the unknown medium at an angle of <math alttext="57 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mn>57</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup></math> from the boundary surface between the two media. What is the index of refraction for the unknown medium?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
